api_list.name: Set user dialog json
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://waifu.p.rapidapi.com/v1/user/dialog/json/{user_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "waifu.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.put(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all users paged by hundreds
api_list.description: Get all users paged by hundreds

api_list.name: Reset user dialog
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://waifu.p.rapidapi.com/v1/user/dialog/{user_id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "waifu.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
